name: Fahrenheit 3000
overview: Fahrenheit 3000 is a variant of Jet Set Willy where the Dragon nuclear reactor has gone critical and is about to have a meltdown. The task at hand is to find and operate all the pressure valves to release excess pressure from the core and flood it to shut down the reactor. There are 64 screens to explore and there is a radiation meter that acts as a time limit for the game.
